title: Impact of Remote and Blended Learning in Technology Education (TE): Implementation Strategies for Secondary Education

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of foundational technology education (TE) concepts and laboratory equipment usage
context.additional_context: Exploring sustainability in technology education post-COVID-19. Strategies needed to overcome practical limitations in BYOD environments.

learning_goals: Learners can propose integrated theory-practice approaches for technical education using a blended learning design framework.
Learners can design at least two project-based assessment tools to maintain student engagement in online environments.
Learners can develop three alternative remote practical strategies (e.g., virtual simulations) to address unequal resource access.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
